caller_intent: Callie is dealing with a legal situation (lawsuit) and is hesitant to proceed with insurance renewals until after the matter is resolved. She is interested in a home insurance quote that could lower her deductible.
resolution_steps: Holly confirms the renewal date (30th) and clarifies that renewals can be done after the legal settlement.
Holly suggests keeping auto insurance with Progressive and provides a home insurance quote with a lower deductible.
Holly reassures Callie there is no penalty for delaying the homeowner's renewal.
knowledge_required: Insurance renewal processes and flexibility around legal settlements
Home insurance quoting strategies to reduce deductibles
summary: Holly from Alliance Insurance discusses renewal options with Callie, who is waiting on a legal matter. Holly provides options to keep auto insurance with Progressive and a home insurance quote, noting flexibility in renewal timing. Callie will follow up after her legal situation is resolved.
